title: Atoms, exchange and covering properties, atomicity

blocks.name: chcv1
blocks.content: The Hilbert lattice has the covering property. Proposition 1(ii) of [Kalmbach] p. 140 (and its converse). (Contributed by NM, 11-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm chcv1(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat)), wb(wn(wss(c1, c0)), wbr(c0, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1))))
} = {
  impbid(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat)), wn(wss(c1, c0)), wbr(c0, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1)))
  sylan2b(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat), wi(wn(wss(c1, c0)), wbr(c0, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1))), wrex(hs0, chba, wa(wne(cv(hs0), c0v), wceq(c1, cfv(cspn, csn(cv(hs0)))))))
  atom1d(hs0, c1)
  imp(wcel(c0, cch), wrex(hs0, chba, wa(wne(cv(hs0), c0v), wceq(c1, cfv(cspn, csn(cv(hs0)))))), wi(wn(wss(c1, c0)), wbr(c0, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1))))
  rexlimdva(hs0, chba, wcel(c0, cch), wa(wne(cv(hs0), c0v), wceq(c1, cfv(cspn, csn(cv(hs0))))), wi(wn(wss(c1, c0)), wbr(c0, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1))))
  adantld(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(cv(hs0), chba)), wne(cv(hs0), c0v), wceq(c1, cfv(cspn, csn(cv(hs0)))), wi(wn(wss(c1, c0)), wbr(c0, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1))))
  syl5ibrcom(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(cv(hs0), chba)), wceq(c1, cfv(cspn, csn(cv(hs0)))), wi(wn(wss(c1, c0)), wbr(c0, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1))), wi(wn(wss(cfv(cspn, csn(cv(hs0))), c0)), wbr(c0, ccv, co(c0, chj, cfv(cspn, csn(cv(hs0)))))))
  spansncv2(c0, cv(hs0))
  imbi12d(wceq(c1, cfv(cspn, csn(cv(hs0)))), wn(wss(c1, c0)), wbr(c0, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1)), wn(wss(cfv(cspn, csn(cv(hs0))), c0)), wbr(c0, ccv, co(c0, chj, cfv(cspn, csn(cv(hs0))))))
  notbid(wceq(c1, cfv(cspn, csn(cv(hs0)))), wss(c1, c0), wss(cfv(cspn, csn(cv(hs0))), c0))
  sseq1(c1, cfv(cspn, csn(cv(hs0))), c0)
  breq2d(c0, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1), co(c0, chj, cfv(cspn, csn(cv(hs0)))), wceq(c1, cfv(cspn, csn(cv(hs0)))))
  oveq2(c1, cfv(cspn, csn(cv(hs0))), c0, chj)
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat), wi(wbr(c0, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1)), wn(wss(c1, c0))), wcel(c1, cch))
  atelch(c1)
  sylibrd(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wbr(c0, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1)), wn(wss(c1, c0)), wpss(c0, co(c0, chj, c1)))
  syldan(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wi(wbr(c0, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1)), wpss(c0, co(c0, chj, c1))), wcel(co(c0, chj, c1), cch))
  chjcl(c0, c1)
  cvpss(c0, co(c0, chj, c1))
  chnle(c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cch))
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wn(wss(c1, c0)), wbr(c0, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm chcv1(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms)→(¬ c1 ⊆ c0 ↔ c0[<oH](c0[vH]c1)))
} = {
  impbid((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms), ¬ c1 ⊆ c0, c0[<oH](c0[vH]c1))
  sylan2b(c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ HAtoms, (¬ c1 ⊆ c0 → c0[<oH](c0[vH]c1)), ∃(hs0 ∈ ~H,(hs0 ≠ 0h ∧ c1 =(span ` { hs0 }))))
  atom1d(hs0, c1)
  imp(c0 ∈ CH, ∃(hs0 ∈ ~H,(hs0 ≠ 0h ∧ c1 =(span ` { hs0 }))), (¬ c1 ⊆ c0 → c0[<oH](c0[vH]c1)))
  rexlimdva(hs0, chba, c0 ∈ CH, (hs0 ≠ 0h ∧ c1 =(span ` { hs0 })), (¬ c1 ⊆ c0 → c0[<oH](c0[vH]c1)))
  adantld((c0 ∈ CH ∧ hs0 ∈ ~H), hs0 ≠ 0h, c1 =(span ` { hs0 }), (¬ c1 ⊆ c0 → c0[<oH](c0[vH]c1)))
  syl5ibrcom((c0 ∈ CH ∧ hs0 ∈ ~H), c1 =(span ` { hs0 }), (¬ c1 ⊆ c0 → c0[<oH](c0[vH]c1)), (¬(span ` { hs0 })⊆ c0 → c0[<oH](c0[vH](span ` { hs0 }))))
  spansncv2(c0, hs0)
  imbi12d(c1 =(span ` { hs0 }), ¬ c1 ⊆ c0, c0[<oH](c0[vH]c1), ¬(span ` { hs0 })⊆ c0, c0[<oH](c0[vH](span ` { hs0 })))
  notbid(c1 =(span ` { hs0 }), c1 ⊆ c0, (span ` { hs0 })⊆ c0)
  sseq1(c1, (span ` { hs0 }), c0)
  breq2d(c0, ccv, (c0[vH]c1), (c0[vH](span ` { hs0 })), c1 =(span ` { hs0 }))
  oveq2(c1, (span ` { hs0 }), c0, chj)
  sylan2(c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ HAtoms, (c0[<oH](c0[vH]c1)→ ¬ c1 ⊆ c0), c1 ∈ CH)
  atelch(c1)
  sylibrd((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH), c0[<oH](c0[vH]c1), ¬ c1 ⊆ c0, c0 ⊊(c0[vH]c1))
  syldan(c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH, (c0[<oH](c0[vH]c1)→ c0 ⊊(c0[vH]c1)), (c0[vH]c1)∈ CH)
  chjcl(c0, c1)
  cvpss(c0, (c0[vH]c1))
  chnle(c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ CH)
  diff.hs0.w((¬ c1 ⊆ c0 → c0[<oH](c0[vH]c1)))
}

blocks.name: chcv2
blocks.content: The Hilbert lattice has the covering property. (Contributed by NM, 11-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: chjatom
blocks.content: The join of a closed subspace and an atom equals their subspace sum. Special case of remark in [Kalmbach] p. 65, stating that if ` A ` or ` B ` is finite-dimensional, then this equality holds. (Contributed by NM, 4-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm chjatom(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat)), wceq(co(c0, cph, c1), co(c0, chj, c1)))
} = {
  imp(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat), wceq(co(c0, cph, c1), co(c0, chj, c1)))
  syl5bi(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat), wceq(co(c0, cph, c1), co(c0, chj, c1)), wrex(hs0, chba, wa(wne(cv(hs0), c0v), wceq(c1, cfv(cspn, csn(cv(hs0)))))))
  atom1d(hs0, c1)
  rexlimdv(hs0, chba, wcel(c0, cch), wa(wne(cv(hs0), c0v), wceq(c1, cfv(cspn, csn(cv(hs0))))), wceq(co(c0, cph, c1), co(c0, chj, c1)))
  com3l(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wa(wne(cv(hs0), c0v), wceq(c1, cfv(cspn, csn(cv(hs0))))), wceq(co(c0, cph, c1), co(c0, chj, c1)))
  adantl(wne(cv(hs0), c0v), wceq(c1, cfv(cspn, csn(cv(hs0)))), wi(wcel(c0, cch), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wceq(co(c0, cph, c1), co(c0, chj, c1)))))
  expd(wceq(c1, cfv(cspn, csn(cv(hs0)))), wcel(c0, cch), wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wceq(co(c0, cph, c1), co(c0, chj, c1)))
  syl5ibr(wceq(c1, cfv(cspn, csn(cv(hs0)))), wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(cv(hs0), chba)), wceq(co(c0, cph, c1), co(c0, chj, c1)), wceq(co(c0, cph, cfv(cspn, csn(cv(hs0)))), co(c0, chj, cfv(cspn, csn(cv(hs0))))))
  spansnj(c0, cv(hs0))
  eqeq12d(co(c0, cph, c1), co(c0, chj, c1), co(c0, cph, cfv(cspn, csn(cv(hs0)))), co(c0, chj, cfv(cspn, csn(cv(hs0)))), wceq(c1, cfv(cspn, csn(cv(hs0)))))
  oveq2(c1, cfv(cspn, csn(cv(hs0))), c0, cph)
  oveq2(c1, cfv(cspn, csn(cv(hs0))), c0, chj)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cch))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(co(c0, cph, c1), co(c0, chj, c1)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm chjatom(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms)→(c0[+H]c1)=(c0[vH]c1))
} = {
  imp(c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ HAtoms, (c0[+H]c1)=(c0[vH]c1))
  syl5bi(c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ HAtoms, (c0[+H]c1)=(c0[vH]c1), ∃(hs0 ∈ ~H,(hs0 ≠ 0h ∧ c1 =(span ` { hs0 }))))
  atom1d(hs0, c1)
  rexlimdv(hs0, chba, c0 ∈ CH, (hs0 ≠ 0h ∧ c1 =(span ` { hs0 })), (c0[+H]c1)=(c0[vH]c1))
  com3l(c0 ∈ CH, hs0 ∈ ~H, (hs0 ≠ 0h ∧ c1 =(span ` { hs0 })), (c0[+H]c1)=(c0[vH]c1))
  adantl(hs0 ≠ 0h, c1 =(span ` { hs0 }), (c0 ∈ CH →(hs0 ∈ ~H →(c0[+H]c1)=(c0[vH]c1))))
  expd(c1 =(span ` { hs0 }), c0 ∈ CH, hs0 ∈ ~H, (c0[+H]c1)=(c0[vH]c1))
  syl5ibr(c1 =(span ` { hs0 }), (c0 ∈ CH ∧ hs0 ∈ ~H), (c0[+H]c1)=(c0[vH]c1), (c0[+H](span ` { hs0 }))=(c0[vH](span ` { hs0 })))
  spansnj(c0, hs0)
  eqeq12d((c0[+H]c1), (c0[vH]c1), (c0[+H](span ` { hs0 })), (c0[vH](span ` { hs0 })), c1 =(span ` { hs0 }))
  oveq2(c1, (span ` { hs0 }), c0, cph)
  oveq2(c1, (span ` { hs0 }), c0, chj)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ CH)
  diff.hs0.w((c0[+H]c1)=(c0[vH]c1))
}

blocks.name: shatomici
blocks.content: The lattice of Hilbert subspaces is atomic, i.e. any nonzero element is greater than or equal to some atom. Part of proof of Theorem 16.9 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 70. (Contributed by NM, 24-Nov-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm shatomici(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(wne(c0, c0h), wrex(s0, cat, wss(cv(s0), c0)))
  -| wcel(c0, csh)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  sylbi(wne(c0, c0h), wrex(s0, cat, wss(cv(s0), c0)), wrex(hs0, c0, wne(cv(hs0), c0v)))
  shne0i(hs0, c0)
  rexlimiva(hs0, c0, wne(cv(hs0), c0v), wrex(s0, cat, wss(cv(s0), c0)))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wne(cv(hs0), c0v)), wrex(s0, cat, wss(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cfv(cort, cfv(cort, csn(cv(hs0)))), cat), wss(cfv(cort, cfv(cort, csn(cv(hs0)))), c0))
  sylan(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wne(cv(hs0), c0v), wcel(cfv(cort, cfv(cort, csn(cv(hs0)))), cat), wcel(cv(hs0), chba))
  sheli(cv(hs0), c0)
  h1da(cv(hs0))
  adantr(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wne(cv(hs0), c0v), wss(cfv(cort, cfv(cort, csn(cv(hs0)))), c0))
  mpan(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cfv(cort, cfv(cort, csn(cv(hs0)))), c0), wcel(c0, csh))
  sh1dle(c0, cv(hs0))
  rspcev(s0, cfv(cort, cfv(cort, csn(cv(hs0)))), cat, wss(cfv(cort, cfv(cort, csn(cv(hs0)))), c0), wss(cv(s0), c0))
  sseq1(cv(s0), cfv(cort, cfv(cort, csn(cv(hs0)))), c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s0, cat, wss(cv(s0), c0)))
  diff.cat.s(s0)
  diff.wss.s(s0, cfv(cort, cfv(cort, csn(cv(hs0)))), c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cort, cfv(cort, csn(cv(hs0))))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cort, csn(cv(hs0)))
  diff.cort.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm shatomici(setvar s0, class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ≠ 0H → ∃(s0 ∈ HAtoms, s0 ⊆ c0))
  ⊣ c0 ∈ SH
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  sylbi(c0 ≠ 0H, ∃(s0 ∈ HAtoms, s0 ⊆ c0), ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ≠ 0h))
  shne0i(hs0, c0)
  rexlimiva(hs0, c0, hs0 ≠ 0h, ∃(s0 ∈ HAtoms, s0 ⊆ c0))
  syl2anc((hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ≠ 0h), ∃(s0 ∈ HAtoms, s0 ⊆ c0), (_|_ `(_|_ ` { hs0 }))∈ HAtoms, (_|_ `(_|_ ` { hs0 }))⊆ c0)
  sylan(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ≠ 0h, (_|_ `(_|_ ` { hs0 }))∈ HAtoms, hs0 ∈ ~H)
  sheli(hs0, c0)
  h1da(hs0)
  adantr(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ≠ 0h, (_|_ `(_|_ ` { hs0 }))⊆ c0)
  mpan(hs0 ∈ c0, (_|_ `(_|_ ` { hs0 }))⊆ c0, c0 ∈ SH)
  sh1dle(c0, hs0)
  rspcev(s0, (_|_ `(_|_ ` { hs0 })), cat, (_|_ `(_|_ ` { hs0 }))⊆ c0, s0 ⊆ c0)
  sseq1(s0, (_|_ `(_|_ ` { hs0 })), c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(∃(s0 ∈ HAtoms, s0 ⊆ c0))
  diff.cat.s(s0)
  diff.wss.s(s0, (_|_ `(_|_ ` { hs0 })), c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cort, (_|_ ` { hs0 }))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cort, { hs0 })
  diff.cort.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: hatomici
blocks.content: The Hilbert lattice is atomic, i.e. any nonzero element is greater than or equal to some atom. Remark in [Kalmbach] p. 140. (Contributed by NM, 22-Jul-2001.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: hatomic
blocks.content: A Hilbert lattice is atomic, i.e. any nonzero element is greater than or equal to some atom. Remark in [Kalmbach] p. 140. Also Definition 3.4-2 in [MegPav2000] p. 2345 (PDF p. 8). (Contributed by NM, 24-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm hatomic(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wne(c0, c0h)), wrex(s0, cat, wss(cv(s0), c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  imp(wcel(c0, cch), wne(c0, c0h), wrex(s0, cat, wss(cv(s0), c0)))
  dedth(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch), wi(wne(c0, c0h), wrex(s0, cat, wss(cv(s0), c0))), wi(wne(cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch)), c0h), wrex(s0, cat, wss(cv(s0), cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch))))))
  imbi12d(wceq(c0, cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch))), wne(c0, c0h), wrex(s0, cat, wss(cv(s0), c0)), wne(cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch)), c0h), wrex(s0, cat, wss(cv(s0), cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch)))))
  neeq1(c0, cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch)), c0h)
  rexbidv(s0, cat, wceq(c0, cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch))), wss(cv(s0), c0), wss(cv(s0), cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch))))
  sseq2(c0, cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch)), cv(s0))
  hatomici(s0, cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch)))
  elimel(c0, cch, c0h)
  h0elch()
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch)))
  diff.cif.s(s0, c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch))
  diff.c0h.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cch)
  diff.cch.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm hatomic(setvar s0, class c0) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c0 ≠ 0H)→ ∃(s0 ∈ HAtoms, s0 ⊆ c0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  imp(c0 ∈ CH, c0 ≠ 0H, ∃(s0 ∈ HAtoms, s0 ⊆ c0))
  dedth(c0, c0h, c0 ∈ CH, (c0 ≠ 0H → ∃(s0 ∈ HAtoms, s0 ⊆ c0)), (if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H)≠ 0H → ∃(s0 ∈ HAtoms, s0 ⊆ if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H))))
  imbi12d(c0 = if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H), c0 ≠ 0H, ∃(s0 ∈ HAtoms, s0 ⊆ c0), if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H)≠ 0H, ∃(s0 ∈ HAtoms, s0 ⊆ if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H)))
  neeq1(c0, if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H), c0h)
  rexbidv(s0, cat, c0 = if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H), s0 ⊆ c0, s0 ⊆ if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H))
  sseq2(c0, if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H), s0)
  hatomici(s0, if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H))
  elimel(c0, cch, c0h)
  h0elch()
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H))
  diff.cif.s(s0, c0, c0h, c0 ∈ CH)
  diff.c0h.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cch)
  diff.cch.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: shatomistici
blocks.content: The lattice of Hilbert subspaces is atomistic, i.e. any element is the supremum of its atoms. Part of proof of Theorem 16.9 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 70. (Contributed by NM, 26-Nov-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm shatomistici(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wceq(c0, cfv(cspn, cuni(crab(s0, cat, wss(cv(s0), c0)))))
  -| wcel(c0, csh)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  eqssi(c0, cfv(cspn, cuni(crab(s0, cat, wss(cv(s0), c0)))))
  ssriv(hs0, c0, cfv(cspn, cuni(crab(s0, cat, wss(cv(s0), c0)))))
  pm2.61ne(cv(hs0), c0v, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cspn, cuni(crab(s0, cat, wss(cv(s0), c0))))), wcel(c0v, cfv(cspn, cuni(crab(s0, cat, wss(cv(s0), c0))))))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c0v, cfv(cspn, cuni(crab(s0, cat, wss(cv(s0), c0)))))
  sseldd(cv(hs0), cfv(cspn, cuni(crab(s0, cat, wss(cv(s0), c0)))), cfv(cspn, csn(cv(hs0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wne(cv(hs0), c0v)))
  eqsstr3d(cfv(cspn, csn(cv(hs0))), cfv(cspn, cuni(crab(s0, cat, wss(cv(s0), c0)))), cfv(cspn, cfv(cspn, csn(cv(hs0)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wne(cv(hs0), c0v)))
  adantr(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wne(cv(hs0), c0v), wceq(cfv(cspn, cfv(cspn, csn(cv(hs0)))), cfv(cspn, csn(cv(hs0)))))
  3syl(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cfv(cspn, cfv(cspn, csn(cv(hs0)))), cfv(cspn, csn(cv(hs0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wcel(cfv(cspn, csn(cv(hs0))), csh))
  spansnsh(cv(hs0))
  spanid(cfv(cspn, csn(cv(hs0))))

blocks.name: hatomistici
blocks.content: ` CH ` is atomistic, i.e. any element is the supremum of its atoms. Remark in [Kalmbach] p. 140. (Contributed by NM, 14-Aug-2002.) (New usage is discouraged.)

  ⊢ c0 =(\/H ` { s0 ∈ HAtoms | s0 ⊆ c0 })
  ⊣ c0 ∈ CH

  sylib(hs0 ∈ HAtoms, ¬(hs0 ⊆ c0 ∧ hs0 ⊆(_|_ `(\/H ` { s0 ∈ HAtoms | s0 ⊆ c0 }))), (hs0 ⊆ c0 → ¬ hs0 ⊆(_|_ `(\/H ` { s0 ∈ HAtoms | s0 ⊆ c0 }))))

blocks.name: chpssati
blocks.content: Two Hilbert lattice elements in a proper subset relationship imply the existence of an atom less than or equal to one but not the other. (Contributed by NM, 10-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm chpssati(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wpss(c0, c1), wrex(s0, cat, wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wn(wss(cv(s0), c0)))))
  -| wcel(c0, cch)
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl(wpss(c0, c1), wrex(s0, cat, wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wn(wss(cv(s0), c0)))), wn(wss(c1, c0)))
  simprbi(wpss(c0, c1), wn(wss(c1, c0)), wss(c0, c1))
  dfpss3(c0, c1)
  sylibr(wn(wss(c1, c0)), wrex(s0, cat, wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wn(wss(cv(s0), c0)))), wn(wral(s0, cat, wn(wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wn(wss(cv(s0), c0)))))))
  con3i(wss(c1, c0), wral(s0, cat, wn(wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wn(wss(cv(s0), c0))))))
  sylbir(wral(s0, cat, wn(wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wn(wss(cv(s0), c0))))), wss(c1, c0), wral(s0, cat, wi(wss(cv(s0), c1), wss(cv(s0), c0))))
  ralbii(s0, cat, wi(wss(cv(s0), c1), wss(cv(s0), c0)), wn(wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wn(wss(cv(s0), c0)))))
  iman(wss(cv(s0), c1), wss(cv(s0), c0))
  sylbir(wral(s0, cat, wi(wss(cv(s0), c1), wss(cv(s0), c0))), wss(c1, c0), wss(crab(s0, cat, wss(cv(s0), c1)), crab(s0, cat, wss(cv(s0), c0))))
  ss2rab(s0, cat, wss(cv(s0), c1), wss(cv(s0), c0))
  3sstr4g(c1, c0, cfv(chsup, crab(s0, cat, wss(cv(s0), c1))), cfv(chsup, crab(s0, cat, wss(cv(s0), c0))), wss(crab(s0, cat, wss(cv(s0), c1)), crab(s0, cat, wss(cv(s0), c0))))
  mp2an(wi(wss(crab(s0, cat, wss(cv(s0), c1)), crab(s0, cat, wss(cv(s0), c0))), wss(cfv(chsup, crab(s0, cat, wss(cv(s0), c1))), cfv(chsup, crab(s0, cat, wss(cv(s0), c0))))), wss(crab(s0, cat, wss(cv(s0), c1)), cch), wss(crab(s0, cat, wss(cv(s0), c0)), cch))
  sstri(crab(s0, cat, wss(cv(s0), c1)), cch, cat)
  ssrab2(s0, cat, wss(cv(s0), c1))
  sstri(crab(s0, cat, wss(cv(s0), c0)), cch, cat)
  ssrab2(s0, cat, wss(cv(s0), c0))
  atssch()
  chsupss(crab(s0, cat, wss(cv(s0), c1)), crab(s0, cat, wss(cv(s0), c0)))
  hatomistici(s0, c1)
  hatomistici(s0, c0)
  dfrex2(s0, cat, wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wn(wss(cv(s0), c0))))
  diff.cat.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm chpssati(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ⊊ c1 → ∃(s0 ∈ HAtoms,(s0 ⊆ c1 ∧ ¬ s0 ⊆ c0)))
  ⊣ c0 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c1 ∈ CH
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl(c0 ⊊ c1, ∃(s0 ∈ HAtoms,(s0 ⊆ c1 ∧ ¬ s0 ⊆ c0)), ¬ c1 ⊆ c0)
  simprbi(c0 ⊊ c1, ¬ c1 ⊆ c0, c0 ⊆ c1)
  dfpss3(c0, c1)
  sylibr(¬ c1 ⊆ c0, ∃(s0 ∈ HAtoms,(s0 ⊆ c1 ∧ ¬ s0 ⊆ c0)), ¬ ∀(s0 ∈ HAtoms, ¬(s0 ⊆ c1 ∧ ¬ s0 ⊆ c0)))
  con3i(c1 ⊆ c0, ∀(s0 ∈ HAtoms, ¬(s0 ⊆ c1 ∧ ¬ s0 ⊆ c0)))
  sylbir(∀(s0 ∈ HAtoms, ¬(s0 ⊆ c1 ∧ ¬ s0 ⊆ c0)), c1 ⊆ c0, ∀(s0 ∈ HAtoms,(s0 ⊆ c1 → s0 ⊆ c0)))
  ralbii(s0, cat, (s0 ⊆ c1 → s0 ⊆ c0), ¬(s0 ⊆ c1 ∧ ¬ s0 ⊆ c0))
  iman(s0 ⊆ c1, s0 ⊆ c0)
  sylbir(∀(s0 ∈ HAtoms,(s0 ⊆ c1 → s0 ⊆ c0)), c1 ⊆ c0, { s0 ∈ HAtoms | s0 ⊆ c1 } ⊆ { s0 ∈ HAtoms | s0 ⊆ c0 })
  ss2rab(s0, cat, s0 ⊆ c1, s0 ⊆ c0)
  3sstr4g(c1, c0, (\/H ` { s0 ∈ HAtoms | s0 ⊆ c1 }), (\/H ` { s0 ∈ HAtoms | s0 ⊆ c0 }), { s0 ∈ HAtoms | s0 ⊆ c1 } ⊆ { s0 ∈ HAtoms | s0 ⊆ c0 })
  mp2an(({ s0 ∈ HAtoms | s0 ⊆ c1 } ⊆ { s0 ∈ HAtoms | s0 ⊆ c0 } →(\/H ` { s0 ∈ HAtoms | s0 ⊆ c1 })⊆(\/H ` { s0 ∈ HAtoms | s0 ⊆ c0 })), { s0 ∈ HAtoms | s0 ⊆ c1 } ⊆ CH, { s0 ∈ HAtoms | s0 ⊆ c0 } ⊆ CH)
  sstri({ s0 ∈ HAtoms | s0 ⊆ c1 }, cch, cat)
  ssrab2(s0, cat, s0 ⊆ c1)
  sstri({ s0 ∈ HAtoms | s0 ⊆ c0 }, cch, cat)
  ssrab2(s0, cat, s0 ⊆ c0)
  atssch()
  chsupss({ s0 ∈ HAtoms | s0 ⊆ c1 }, { s0 ∈ HAtoms | s0 ⊆ c0 })
  hatomistici(s0, c1)
  hatomistici(s0, c0)
  dfrex2(s0, cat, (s0 ⊆ c1 ∧ ¬ s0 ⊆ c0))
  diff.cat.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: chrelati
blocks.content: The Hilbert lattice is relatively atomic. Remark 2 of [Kalmbach] p. 149. (Contributed by NM, 11-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm chrelati(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wpss(c0, c1), wrex(s0, cat, wa(wpss(c0, co(c0, chj, cv(s0))), wss(co(c0, chj, cv(s0)), c1))))
  -| wcel(c0, cch)
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  mpbid(wpss(c0, c1), wrex(s0, cat, wa(wpss(c0, co(c0, chj, cv(s0))), wss(co(c0, chj, cv(s0)), c1))), wrex(s0, cat, wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wn(wss(cv(s0), c0)))))
  chpssati(s0, c0, c1)
  rexbidva(s0, cat, wpss(c0, c1), wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wn(wss(cv(s0), c0))), wa(wpss(c0, co(c0, chj, cv(s0))), wss(co(c0, chj, cv(s0)), c1)))
  syl5bb(wa(wpss(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), cat)), wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wn(wss(cv(s0), c0))), wa(wpss(c0, co(c0, chj, cv(s0))), wss(co(c0, chj, cv(s0)), c1)), wa(wn(wss(cv(s0), c0)), wss(cv(s0), c1)))
  ancom(wss(cv(s0), c1), wn(wss(cv(s0), c0)))
  syl2an(wpss(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), cat), wb(wa(wn(wss(cv(s0), c0)), wss(cv(s0), c1)), wa(wpss(c0, co(c0, chj, cv(s0))), wss(co(c0, chj, cv(s0)), c1))), wss(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), cch))
  pssss(c0, c1)
  atelch(cv(s0))
  anbi12d(wa(wss(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), cch)), wn(wss(cv(s0), c0)), wss(cv(s0), c1), wpss(c0, co(c0, chj, cv(s0))), wss(co(c0, chj, cv(s0)), c1))
  adantl(wss(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), cch), wb(wn(wss(cv(s0), c0)), wpss(c0, co(c0, chj, cv(s0)))))
  mpan(wcel(cv(s0), cch), wb(wn(wss(cv(s0), c0)), wpss(c0, co(c0, chj, cv(s0)))), wcel(c0, cch))
  chnle(c0, cv(s0))
  sylan9bb(wss(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), cch), wss(cv(s0), c1), wss(co(c0, chj, cv(s0)), c1), wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(cv(s0), c1)))
  ibar(wss(c0, c1), wss(cv(s0), c1))
  mp3an13(wcel(cv(s0), cch), wb(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(cv(s0), c1)), wss(co(c0, chj, cv(s0)), c1)), wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch))
  chlub(c0, cv(s0), c1)
  diff.wpss.s(s0, c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm chrelati(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ⊊ c1 → ∃(s0 ∈ HAtoms,(c0 ⊊(c0[vH]s0)∧(c0[vH]s0)⊆ c1)))
  ⊣ c0 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c1 ∈ CH
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  mpbid(c0 ⊊ c1, ∃(s0 ∈ HAtoms,(c0 ⊊(c0[vH]s0)∧(c0[vH]s0)⊆ c1)), ∃(s0 ∈ HAtoms,(s0 ⊆ c1 ∧ ¬ s0 ⊆ c0)))
  chpssati(s0, c0, c1)
  rexbidva(s0, cat, c0 ⊊ c1, (s0 ⊆ c1 ∧ ¬ s0 ⊆ c0), (c0 ⊊(c0[vH]s0)∧(c0[vH]s0)⊆ c1))
  syl5bb((c0 ⊊ c1 ∧ s0 ∈ HAtoms), (s0 ⊆ c1 ∧ ¬ s0 ⊆ c0), (c0 ⊊(c0[vH]s0)∧(c0[vH]s0)⊆ c1), (¬ s0 ⊆ c0 ∧ s0 ⊆ c1))
  ancom(s0 ⊆ c1, ¬ s0 ⊆ c0)
  syl2an(c0 ⊊ c1, s0 ∈ HAtoms, ((¬ s0 ⊆ c0 ∧ s0 ⊆ c1)↔(c0 ⊊(c0[vH]s0)∧(c0[vH]s0)⊆ c1)), c0 ⊆ c1, s0 ∈ CH)
  pssss(c0, c1)
  atelch(s0)
  anbi12d((c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ s0 ∈ CH), ¬ s0 ⊆ c0, s0 ⊆ c1, c0 ⊊(c0[vH]s0), (c0[vH]s0)⊆ c1)
  adantl(c0 ⊆ c1, s0 ∈ CH, (¬ s0 ⊆ c0 ↔ c0 ⊊(c0[vH]s0)))
  mpan(s0 ∈ CH, (¬ s0 ⊆ c0 ↔ c0 ⊊(c0[vH]s0)), c0 ∈ CH)
  chnle(c0, s0)
  sylan9bb(c0 ⊆ c1, s0 ∈ CH, s0 ⊆ c1, (c0[vH]s0)⊆ c1, (c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ s0 ⊆ c1))
  ibar(c0 ⊆ c1, s0 ⊆ c1)
  mp3an13(s0 ∈ CH, ((c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ s0 ⊆ c1)↔(c0[vH]s0)⊆ c1), c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH)
  chlub(c0, s0, c1)
  diff.wpss.s(s0, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: chrelat2i
blocks.content: A consequence of relative atomicity. (Contributed by NM, 30-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm chrelat2i(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wn(wss(c0, c1)), wrex(s0, cat, wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wn(wss(cv(s0), c1)))))
  -| wcel(c0, cch)
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  impbii(wn(wss(c0, c1)), wrex(s0, cat, wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wn(wss(cv(s0), c1)))))
  sylbi(wn(wss(c0, c1)), wrex(s0, cat, wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wn(wss(cv(s0), c1)))), wpss(cin(c0, c1), c0))
  nssinpss(c0, c1)
  syl(wpss(cin(c0, c1), c0), wrex(s0, cat, wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wn(wss(cv(s0), c1)))), wrex(s0, cat, wa(wpss(cin(c0, c1), co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cv(s0))), wss(co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cv(s0)), c0))))
  chrelati(s0, cin(c0, c1), c0)
  reximia(s0, cat, wa(wpss(cin(c0, c1), co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cv(s0))), wss(co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cv(s0)), c0)), wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wn(wss(cv(s0), c1))))
  syl(wcel(cv(s0), cat), wi(wa(wpss(cin(c0, c1), co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cv(s0))), wss(co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cv(s0)), c0)), wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wn(wss(cv(s0), c1)))), wcel(cv(s0), cch))
  atelch(cv(s0))
  jcad(wcel(cv(s0), cch), wa(wpss(cin(c0, c1), co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cv(s0))), wss(co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cv(s0)), c0)), wss(cv(s0), c0), wn(wss(cv(s0), c1)))
  adantld(wcel(cv(s0), cch), wpss(cin(c0, c1), co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cv(s0))), wss(co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cv(s0)), c0), wss(cv(s0), c0))

  anbi12d(wcel(cv(s0), cch), wn(wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wss(cv(s0), c1))), wa(wss(cin(c0, c1), c0), wss(cv(s0), c0)), wpss(cin(c0, c1), co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cv(s0))), wss(co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cv(s0)), c0))

blocks.name: cvati
blocks.content: If a Hilbert lattice element covers another, it equals the other joined with some atom. This is a consequence of the relative atomicity of Hilbert space. (Contributed by NM, 30-Nov-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm cvati(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wbr(c0, ccv, c1), wrex(s0, cat, wceq(co(c0, chj, cv(s0)), c1)))
  -| wcel(c0, cch)
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  mpd(wbr(c0, ccv, c1), wrex(s0, cat, wceq(co(c0, chj, cv(s0)), c1)), wrex(s0, cat, wa(wpss(c0, co(c0, chj, cv(s0))), wss(co(c0, chj, cv(s0)), c1))))
  syl(wbr(c0, ccv, c1), wrex(s0, cat, wa(wpss(c0, co(c0, chj, cv(s0))), wss(co(c0, chj, cv(s0)), c1))), wpss(c0, c1))
  mp2an(wi(wbr(c0, ccv, c1), wpss(c0, c1)), wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch))
  cvpss(c0, c1)
  chrelati(s0, c0, c1)
  reximdvai(s0, cat, wbr(c0, ccv, c1), wa(wpss(c0, co(c0, chj, cv(s0))), wss(co(c0, chj, cv(s0)), c1)), wceq(co(c0, chj, cv(s0)), c1))
  syl11(wbr(c0, ccv, c1), wcel(cv(s0), cat), wi(wa(wpss(c0, co(c0, chj, cv(s0))), wss(co(c0, chj, cv(s0)), c1)), wceq(co(c0, chj, cv(s0)), c1)), wcel(co(c0, chj, cv(s0)), cch))
  mp3an12(wcel(co(c0, chj, cv(s0)), cch), wi(wbr(c0, ccv, c1), wi(wa(wpss(c0, co(c0, chj, cv(s0))), wss(co(c0, chj, cv(s0)), c1)), wceq(co(c0, chj, cv(s0)), c1))), wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch))
  cvnbtwn2(c0, c1, co(c0, chj, cv(s0)))
  sylancr(wcel(cv(s0), cat), wcel(co(c0, chj, cv(s0)), cch), wcel(c0, cch), wcel(cv(s0), cch))
  atelch(cv(s0))
  chjcl(c0, cv(s0))
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c0, ccv, c1)
  diff.ccv.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cvati(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0[<oH]c1 → ∃(s0 ∈ HAtoms,(c0[vH]s0)= c1))
  ⊣ c0 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c1 ∈ CH
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  mpd(c0[<oH]c1, ∃(s0 ∈ HAtoms,(c0[vH]s0)= c1), ∃(s0 ∈ HAtoms,(c0 ⊊(c0[vH]s0)∧(c0[vH]s0)⊆ c1)))
  syl(c0[<oH]c1, ∃(s0 ∈ HAtoms,(c0 ⊊(c0[vH]s0)∧(c0[vH]s0)⊆ c1)), c0 ⊊ c1)
  mp2an((c0[<oH]c1 → c0 ⊊ c1), c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH)
  cvpss(c0, c1)
  chrelati(s0, c0, c1)
  reximdvai(s0, cat, c0[<oH]c1, (c0 ⊊(c0[vH]s0)∧(c0[vH]s0)⊆ c1), (c0[vH]s0)= c1)
  syl11(c0[<oH]c1, s0 ∈ HAtoms, ((c0 ⊊(c0[vH]s0)∧(c0[vH]s0)⊆ c1)→(c0[vH]s0)= c1), (c0[vH]s0)∈ CH)
  mp3an12((c0[vH]s0)∈ CH, (c0[<oH]c1 →((c0 ⊊(c0[vH]s0)∧(c0[vH]s0)⊆ c1)→(c0[vH]s0)= c1)), c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH)
  cvnbtwn2(c0, c1, (c0[vH]s0))
  sylancr(s0 ∈ HAtoms, (c0[vH]s0)∈ CH, c0 ∈ CH, s0 ∈ CH)
  atelch(s0)
  chjcl(c0, s0)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c0, ccv, c1)
  diff.ccv.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: cvbr4i
blocks.content: An alternate way to express the covering property. (Contributed by NM, 30-Nov-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm cvbr4i(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wbr(c0, ccv, c1), wa(wpss(c0, c1), wrex(s0, cat, wceq(co(c0, chj, cv(s0)), c1))))
  -| wcel(c0, cch)
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  impbii(wbr(c0, ccv, c1), wa(wpss(c0, c1), wrex(s0, cat, wceq(co(c0, chj, cv(s0)), c1))))
  jca(wbr(c0, ccv, c1), wpss(c0, c1), wrex(s0, cat, wceq(co(c0, chj, cv(s0)), c1)))
  mp2an(wi(wbr(c0, ccv, c1), wpss(c0, c1)), wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch))
  cvpss(c0, c1)
  cvati(s0, c0, c1)
  imp(wpss(c0, c1), wrex(s0, cat, wceq(co(c0, chj, cv(s0)), c1)), wbr(c0, ccv, c1))
  rexlimdv(s0, cat, wpss(c0, c1), wceq(co(c0, chj, cv(s0)), c1), wbr(c0, ccv, c1))
  com3r(wpss(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), cat), wceq(co(c0, chj, cv(s0)), c1), wbr(c0, ccv, c1))
  ex(wcel(cv(s0), cat), wceq(co(c0, chj, cv(s0)), c1), wi(wpss(c0, c1), wbr(c0, ccv, c1)))
  biimpd(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cat), wceq(co(c0, chj, cv(s0)), c1)), wpss(c0, c1), wbr(c0, ccv, c1))
  3bitr3d(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cat), wceq(co(c0, chj, cv(s0)), c1)), wpss(c0, c1), wbr(c0, ccv, c1), wpss(c0, co(c0, chj, cv(s0))), wbr(c0, ccv, co(c0, chj, cv(s0))))
  adantr(wcel(cv(s0), cat), wceq(co(c0, chj, cv(s0)), c1), wb(wpss(c0, co(c0, chj, cv(s0))), wbr(c0, ccv, co(c0, chj, cv(s0)))))
  mpan(wcel(cv(s0), cat), wb(wpss(c0, co(c0, chj, cv(s0))), wbr(c0, ccv, co(c0, chj, cv(s0)))), wcel(c0, cch))
  chcv2(c0, cv(s0))
  adantl(wcel(cv(s0), cat), wceq(co(c0, chj, cv(s0)), c1), wb(wpss(c0, co(c0, chj, cv(s0))), wpss(c0, c1)))
  psseq2(co(c0, chj, cv(s0)), c1, c0)
  adantl(wcel(cv(s0), cat), wceq(co(c0, chj, cv(s0)), c1), wb(wbr(c0, ccv, co(c0, chj, cv(s0))), wbr(c0, ccv, c1)))
  breq2(co(c0, chj, cv(s0)), c1, c0, ccv)
  diff.wpss.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c0, ccv, c1)
  diff.ccv.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cvbr4i(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0[<oH]c1 ↔(c0 ⊊ c1 ∧ ∃(s0 ∈ HAtoms,(c0[vH]s0)= c1)))
  ⊣ c0 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c1 ∈ CH
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {

  mp2an((c0[<oH]c1 → c0 ⊊ c1), c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH)

  cvati(s0, c0, c1)

  rexlimdv(s0, cat, c0 ⊊ c1, (c0[vH]s0)= c1, c0[<oH]c1)

  biimpd((s0 ∈ HAtoms ∧(c0[vH]s0)= c1), c0 ⊊ c1, c0[<oH]c1)
  3bitr3d((s0 ∈ HAtoms ∧(c0[vH]s0)= c1), c0 ⊊ c1, c0[<oH]c1, c0 ⊊(c0[vH]s0), c0[<oH](c0[vH]s0))
  adantr(s0 ∈ HAtoms, (c0[vH]s0)= c1, (c0 ⊊(c0[vH]s0)↔ c0[<oH](c0[vH]s0)))
  mpan(s0 ∈ HAtoms, (c0 ⊊(c0[vH]s0)↔ c0[<oH](c0[vH]s0)), c0 ∈ CH)
  chcv2(c0, s0)
  adantl(s0 ∈ HAtoms, (c0[vH]s0)= c1, (c0 ⊊(c0[vH]s0)↔ c0 ⊊ c1))
  psseq2((c0[vH]s0), c1, c0)
  adantl(s0 ∈ HAtoms, (c0[vH]s0)= c1, (c0[<oH](c0[vH]s0)↔ c0[<oH]c1))

  diff.ccv.s(s0)
}

  ancom(wss(cv(hs0), c1), wn(wss(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c1))))
  anbi12d(wcel(cv(hs0), cch), wn(wss(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c1))), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wpss(cin(c0, c1), co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cv(hs0))), wss(co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cv(hs0)), c1))
  mpan(wcel(cv(hs0), cch), wb(wn(wss(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c1))), wpss(cin(c0, c1), co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cv(hs0)))), wcel(cin(c0, c1), cch))
  chnle(cin(c0, c1), cv(hs0))
  syl5bb(wcel(cv(hs0), cch), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wss(co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cv(hs0)), c1), wa(wss(cin(c0, c1), c1), wss(cv(hs0), c1)))

  com23(wcel(cv(hs0), cch), wa(wpss(cin(c0, c1), co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cv(hs0))), wss(co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cv(hs0)), c1)), wbr(cin(c0, c1), ccv, c1), wceq(co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cv(hs0)), c1))
  syl(wcel(cv(hs0), cch), wi(wbr(cin(c0, c1), ccv, c1), wi(wa(wpss(cin(c0, c1), co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cv(hs0))), wss(co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cv(hs0)), c1)), wceq(co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cv(hs0)), c1))), wcel(co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cv(hs0)), cch))
  mpan(wcel(cv(hs0), cch), wcel(co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cv(hs0)), cch), wcel(cin(c0, c1), cch))
  chjcl(cin(c0, c1), cv(hs0))
  mp3an12(wcel(co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cv(hs0)), cch), wi(wbr(cin(c0, c1), ccv, c1), wi(wa(wpss(cin(c0, c1), co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cv(hs0))), wss(co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cv(hs0)), c1)), wceq(co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cv(hs0)), c1))), wcel(cin(c0, c1), cch), wcel(c1, cch))
  chincli(c0, c1)
  cvnbtwn2(cin(c0, c1), c1, co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cv(hs0)))
  diff.hs0.c(cin(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wbr(cin(c0, c1), ccv, c1), wbr(c0, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1))))
}

thm cvexchlem(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ⋂ c1)[<oH]c1 → c0[<oH](c0[vH]c1))
  ⊣ c0 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c1 ∈ CH
} = {
  mpcom((c0 ⋂ c1)[<oH]c1, c0[<oH](c0[vH]c1), ∃(hs0 ∈ HAtoms,(hs0 ⊆ c1 ∧ ¬ hs0 ⊆(c0 ⋂ c1))))
  syl((c0 ⋂ c1)[<oH]c1, ∃(hs0 ∈ HAtoms,(hs0 ⊆ c1 ∧ ¬ hs0 ⊆(c0 ⋂ c1))), (c0 ⋂ c1)⊊ c1)
  mp2an(((c0 ⋂ c1)[<oH]c1 →(c0 ⋂ c1)⊊ c1), (c0 ⋂ c1)∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH)
  cvpss((c0 ⋂ c1), c1)
  chpssati(hs0, (c0 ⋂ c1), c1)
  rexlimiv(hs0, cat, (hs0 ⊆ c1 ∧ ¬ hs0 ⊆(c0 ⋂ c1)), ((c0 ⋂ c1)[<oH]c1 → c0[<oH](c0[vH]c1)))
  exp32(hs0 ∈ HAtoms, (hs0 ⊆ c1 ∧ ¬ hs0 ⊆(c0 ⋂ c1)), (c0 ⋂ c1)[<oH]c1, c0[<oH](c0[vH]c1))
  breqtrd(c0, ccv, (c0[vH]c1), (c0[vH]hs0), (hs0 ∈ HAtoms ∧((hs0 ⊆ c1 ∧ ¬ hs0 ⊆(c0 ⋂ c1))∧(c0 ⋂ c1)[<oH]c1)))
  adantrr(hs0 ∈ HAtoms, (hs0 ⊆ c1 ∧ ¬ hs0 ⊆(c0 ⋂ c1)), (c0 ⋂ c1)[<oH]c1, c0[<oH](c0[vH]hs0))
  sylan2(hs0 ∈ HAtoms, (hs0 ⊆ c1 ∧ ¬ hs0 ⊆(c0 ⋂ c1)), c0[<oH](c0[vH]hs0), ¬ hs0 ⊆ c0)
  biimpar(hs0 ⊆ c1, ¬ hs0 ⊆(c0 ⋂ c1), ¬ hs0 ⊆ c0)
  notbid(hs0 ⊆ c1, hs0 ⊆ c0, hs0 ⊆(c0 ⋂ c1))
  baibr(hs0 ⊆ c1, hs0 ⊆ c0, hs0 ⊆(c0 ⋂ c1))
  bitr3i(hs0 ⊆(c0 ⋂ c1), (hs0 ⊆ c1 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c0), (hs0 ⊆ c0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c1))
  ssin(hs0, c0, c1)
  ancom(hs0 ⊆ c0, hs0 ⊆ c1)
  biimpa(hs0 ∈ HAtoms, ¬ hs0 ⊆ c0, c0[<oH](c0[vH]hs0))
  mpan(hs0 ∈ HAtoms, (¬ hs0 ⊆ c0 ↔ c0[<oH](c0[vH]hs0)), c0 ∈ CH)
  chcv1(c0, hs0)
  sylan(hs0 ∈ HAtoms, ((hs0 ⊆ c1 ∧ ¬ hs0 ⊆(c0 ⋂ c1))∧(c0 ⋂ c1)[<oH]c1), (c0[vH]hs0)=(c0[vH]c1), hs0 ∈ CH)
  atelch(hs0)
  eqtr3d((c0[vH]hs0), (c0[vH]c1), (c0[vH]((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH]hs0)), (hs0 ∈ CH ∧((hs0 ⊆ c1 ∧ ¬ hs0 ⊆(c0 ⋂ c1))∧(c0 ⋂ c1)[<oH]c1)))
  adantr(hs0 ∈ CH, ((hs0 ⊆ c1 ∧ ¬ hs0 ⊆(c0 ⋂ c1))∧(c0 ⋂ c1)[<oH]c1), (c0[vH]((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH]hs0))=(c0[vH]hs0))
  syl5reqr((c0[vH]((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH]hs0)), (c0[vH]hs0), ((c0[vH](c0 ⋂ c1))[vH]hs0), hs0 ∈ CH)
  oveq1i((c0[vH](c0 ⋂ c1)), chj, hs0, c0)
  chabs1i(c0, c1)
  mp3an12(hs0 ∈ CH, ((c0[vH](c0 ⋂ c1))[vH]hs0)=(c0[vH]((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH]hs0)), c0 ∈ CH, (c0 ⋂ c1)∈ CH)
  chjass(c0, (c0 ⋂ c1), hs0)
  oveq2d(c0, chj, ((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH]hs0), c1, (hs0 ∈ CH ∧((hs0 ⊆ c1 ∧ ¬ hs0 ⊆(c0 ⋂ c1))∧(c0 ⋂ c1)[<oH]c1)))
  imp32(hs0 ∈ CH, (hs0 ⊆ c1 ∧ ¬ hs0 ⊆(c0 ⋂ c1)), (c0 ⋂ c1)[<oH]c1, ((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH]hs0)= c1)
  sylbid(hs0 ∈ CH, (hs0 ⊆ c1 ∧ ¬ hs0 ⊆(c0 ⋂ c1)), ((c0 ⋂ c1)[<oH]c1 →((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH]hs0)= c1), ((c0 ⋂ c1)⊊((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH]hs0)∧((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH]hs0)⊆ c1))
  syl5bb(hs0 ∈ CH, (hs0 ⊆ c1 ∧ ¬ hs0 ⊆(c0 ⋂ c1)), ((c0 ⋂ c1)⊊((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH]hs0)∧((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH]hs0)⊆ c1), (¬ hs0 ⊆(c0 ⋂ c1)∧ hs0 ⊆ c1))
  ancom(hs0 ⊆ c1, ¬ hs0 ⊆(c0 ⋂ c1))
  anbi12d(hs0 ∈ CH, ¬ hs0 ⊆(c0 ⋂ c1), hs0 ⊆ c1, (c0 ⋂ c1)⊊((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH]hs0), ((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH]hs0)⊆ c1)
  mpan(hs0 ∈ CH, (¬ hs0 ⊆(c0 ⋂ c1)↔(c0 ⋂ c1)⊊((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH]hs0)), (c0 ⋂ c1)∈ CH)
  chnle((c0 ⋂ c1), hs0)
  syl5bb(hs0 ∈ CH, hs0 ⊆ c1, ((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH]hs0)⊆ c1, ((c0 ⋂ c1)⊆ c1 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c1))
  biantrur(hs0 ⊆ c1, (c0 ⋂ c1)⊆ c1)
  inss2(c0, c1)
  mp3an13(hs0 ∈ CH, (((c0 ⋂ c1)⊆ c1 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c1)↔((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH]hs0)⊆ c1), (c0 ⋂ c1)∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH)
  chlub((c0 ⋂ c1), hs0, c1)
  com23(hs0 ∈ CH, ((c0 ⋂ c1)⊊((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH]hs0)∧((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH]hs0)⊆ c1), (c0 ⋂ c1)[<oH]c1, ((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH]hs0)= c1)
  syl(hs0 ∈ CH, ((c0 ⋂ c1)[<oH]c1 →(((c0 ⋂ c1)⊊((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH]hs0)∧((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH]hs0)⊆ c1)→((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH]hs0)= c1)), ((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH]hs0)∈ CH)
  mpan(hs0 ∈ CH, ((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH]hs0)∈ CH, (c0 ⋂ c1)∈ CH)
  chjcl((c0 ⋂ c1), hs0)
  mp3an12(((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH]hs0)∈ CH, ((c0 ⋂ c1)[<oH]c1 →(((c0 ⋂ c1)⊊((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH]hs0)∧((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH]hs0)⊆ c1)→((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH]hs0)= c1)), (c0 ⋂ c1)∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH)
  chincli(c0, c1)
  cvnbtwn2((c0 ⋂ c1), c1, ((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH]hs0))
  diff.hs0.c((c0 ⋂ c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(((c0 ⋂ c1)[<oH]c1 → c0[<oH](c0[vH]c1)))
}

blocks.name: cvexchi
blocks.content: The Hilbert lattice satisfies the exchange axiom. Proposition 1(iii) of [Kalmbach] p. 140 and its converse. Originally proved by Garrett Birkhoff in 1933. (Contributed by NM, 12-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm cvexchi(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wbr(cin(c0, c1), ccv, c1), wbr(c0, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1)))
  -| wcel(c0, cch)
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
} = {
  impbii(wbr(cin(c0, c1), ccv, c1), wbr(c0, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1)))
  cvexchlem(c0, c1)
  3imtr4i(wbr(c0, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1)), wbr(cin(c0, c1), ccv, c1), wbr(cfv(cort, co(c0, chj, c1)), ccv, cfv(cort, c0)), wbr(cfv(cort, c1), ccv, cfv(cort, cin(c0, c1))))
  3imtr4i(wbr(cfv(cort, co(c0, chj, c1)), ccv, cfv(cort, c0)), wbr(cfv(cort, c1), ccv, cfv(cort, cin(c0, c1))), wbr(cin(cfv(cort, c1), cfv(cort, c0)), ccv, cfv(cort, c0)), wbr(cfv(cort, c1), ccv, co(cfv(cort, c1), chj, cfv(cort, c0))))
  cvexchlem(cfv(cort, c1), cfv(cort, c0))
  breq1i(cfv(cort, co(c0, chj, c1)), ccv, cfv(cort, c0), cin(cfv(cort, c1), cfv(cort, c0)))
  eqtri(cfv(cort, co(c0, chj, c1)), cin(cfv(cort, c1), cfv(cort, c0)), cin(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, c1)))
  chdmj1i(c0, c1)
  incom(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, c1))
  breq2i(cfv(cort, c1), ccv, cfv(cort, cin(c0, c1)), co(cfv(cort, c1), chj, cfv(cort, c0)))
  eqtri(cfv(cort, cin(c0, c1)), co(cfv(cort, c1), chj, cfv(cort, c0)), co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1)))
  chdmm1i(c0, c1)
  chjcomi(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, c1))
  choccli(c0)
  choccli(c1)
  mp2an(wb(wbr(c0, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1)), wbr(cfv(cort, co(c0, chj, c1)), ccv, cfv(cort, c0))), wcel(c0, cch), wcel(co(c0, chj, c1), cch))
  chjcli(c0, c1)
  cvcon3(c0, co(c0, chj, c1))
  mp2an(wb(wbr(cin(c0, c1), ccv, c1), wbr(cfv(cort, c1), ccv, cfv(cort, cin(c0, c1)))), wcel(cin(c0, c1), cch), wcel(c1, cch))
  chincli(c0, c1)
  cvcon3(cin(c0, c1), c1)
}

blocks.name: chrelat2
blocks.content: A consequence of relative atomicity. (Contributed by NM, 1-Jul-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm chrelat2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wb(wn(wss(c0, c1)), wrex(s0, cat, wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wn(wss(cv(s0), c1))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  dedth2h(c0, chba, c1, chba, wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wb(wn(wss(c0, c1)), wrex(s0, cat, wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wn(wss(cv(s0), c1))))), wb(wn(wss(cif(c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch)), c1)), wrex(s0, cat, wa(wss(cv(s0), cif(c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch))), wn(wss(cv(s0), c1))))), wb(wn(wss(cif(c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch)), cif(c1, chba, wcel(c1, cch)))), wrex(s0, cat, wa(wss(cv(s0), cif(c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch))), wn(wss(cv(s0), cif(c1, chba, wcel(c1, cch))))))))
  bibi12d(wceq(c0, cif(c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch))), wn(wss(c0, c1)), wrex(s0, cat, wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wn(wss(cv(s0), c1)))), wn(wss(cif(c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch)), c1)), wrex(s0, cat, wa(wss(cv(s0), cif(c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch))), wn(wss(cv(s0), c1)))))
  notbid(wceq(c0, cif(c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch))), wss(c0, c1), wss(cif(c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch)), c1))
  sseq1(c0, cif(c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch)), c1)
  rexbidv(s0, cat, wceq(c0, cif(c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch))), wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wn(wss(cv(s0), c1))), wa(wss(cv(s0), cif(c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch))), wn(wss(cv(s0), c1))))
  anbi1d(wceq(c0, cif(c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch))), wss(cv(s0), c0), wn(wss(cv(s0), c1)), wss(cv(s0), cif(c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch))))
  sseq2(c0, cif(c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch)), cv(s0))
  bibi12d(wceq(c1, cif(c1, chba, wcel(c1, cch))), wn(wss(cif(c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch)), c1)), wrex(s0, cat, wa(wss(cv(s0), cif(c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch))), wn(wss(cv(s0), c1)))), wn(wss(cif(c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch)), cif(c1, chba, wcel(c1, cch)))), wrex(s0, cat, wa(wss(cv(s0), cif(c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch))), wn(wss(cv(s0), cif(c1, chba, wcel(c1, cch)))))))
  notbid(wceq(c1, cif(c1, chba, wcel(c1, cch))), wss(cif(c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch)), c1), wss(cif(c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch)), cif(c1, chba, wcel(c1, cch))))
  sseq2(c1, cif(c1, chba, wcel(c1, cch)), cif(c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch)))
  rexbidv(s0, cat, wceq(c1, cif(c1, chba, wcel(c1, cch))), wa(wss(cv(s0), cif(c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch))), wn(wss(cv(s0), c1))), wa(wss(cv(s0), cif(c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch))), wn(wss(cv(s0), cif(c1, chba, wcel(c1, cch))))))
  anbi2d(wceq(c1, cif(c1, chba, wcel(c1, cch))), wss(cv(s0), cif(c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch))), wn(wss(cv(s0), c1)), wn(wss(cv(s0), cif(c1, chba, wcel(c1, cch)))))
  notbid(wceq(c1, cif(c1, chba, wcel(c1, cch))), wss(cv(s0), c1), wss(cv(s0), cif(c1, chba, wcel(c1, cch))))
  sseq2(c1, cif(c1, chba, wcel(c1, cch)), cv(s0))
  chrelat2i(s0, cif(c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch)), cif(c1, chba, wcel(c1, cch)))
  ifchhv(c0)
  ifchhv(c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, cif(c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c1, cif(c1, chba, wcel(c1, cch)))
  diff.cif.s(s0, c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cch)
  diff.cif.s(s0, c1, chba, wcel(c1, cch))
  diff.chba.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, cch)
  diff.cch.s(s0)
}

thm chrelat2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH)→(¬ c0 ⊆ c1 ↔ ∃(s0 ∈ HAtoms,(s0 ⊆ c0 ∧ ¬ s0 ⊆ c1))))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  dedth2h(c0, chba, c1, chba, c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH, (¬ c0 ⊆ c1 ↔ ∃(s0 ∈ HAtoms,(s0 ⊆ c0 ∧ ¬ s0 ⊆ c1))), (¬ if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, ~H)⊆ c1 ↔ ∃(s0 ∈ HAtoms,(s0 ⊆ if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, ~H)∧ ¬ s0 ⊆ c1))), (¬ if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, ~H)⊆ if(c1 ∈ CH, c1, ~H)↔ ∃(s0 ∈ HAtoms,(s0 ⊆ if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, ~H)∧ ¬ s0 ⊆ if(c1 ∈ CH, c1, ~H)))))
  bibi12d(c0 = if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, ~H), ¬ c0 ⊆ c1, ∃(s0 ∈ HAtoms,(s0 ⊆ c0 ∧ ¬ s0 ⊆ c1)), ¬ if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, ~H)⊆ c1, ∃(s0 ∈ HAtoms,(s0 ⊆ if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, ~H)∧ ¬ s0 ⊆ c1)))
  notbid(c0 = if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, ~H), c0 ⊆ c1, if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, ~H)⊆ c1)
  sseq1(c0, if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, ~H), c1)
  rexbidv(s0, cat, c0 = if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, ~H), (s0 ⊆ c0 ∧ ¬ s0 ⊆ c1), (s0 ⊆ if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, ~H)∧ ¬ s0 ⊆ c1))
  anbi1d(c0 = if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, ~H), s0 ⊆ c0, ¬ s0 ⊆ c1, s0 ⊆ if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, ~H))
  sseq2(c0, if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, ~H), s0)
  bibi12d(c1 = if(c1 ∈ CH, c1, ~H), ¬ if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, ~H)⊆ c1, ∃(s0 ∈ HAtoms,(s0 ⊆ if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, ~H)∧ ¬ s0 ⊆ c1)), ¬ if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, ~H)⊆ if(c1 ∈ CH, c1, ~H), ∃(s0 ∈ HAtoms,(s0 ⊆ if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, ~H)∧ ¬ s0 ⊆ if(c1 ∈ CH, c1, ~H))))

  anbi2d(c1 = if(c1 ∈ CH, c1, ~H), s0 ⊆ if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, ~H), ¬ s0 ⊆ c1, ¬ s0 ⊆ if(c1 ∈ CH, c1, ~H))

blocks.name: chrelat3
blocks.content: A consequence of relative atomicity. (Contributed by NM, 2-Jul-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: chrelat3i
blocks.content: A consequence of the relative atomicity of Hilbert space: the ordering of Hilbert lattice elements is completely determined by the atoms they majorize. (Contributed by NM, 30-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: chrelat4i
blocks.content: A consequence of relative atomicity. Extensionality principle: two lattice elements are equal iff they majorize the same atoms. (Contributed by NM, 30-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm chrelat4i(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wceq(c0, c1), wral(s0, cat, wb(wss(cv(s0), c0), wss(cv(s0), c1))))
  -| wcel(c0, cch)
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  3bitr4i(wceq(c0, c1), wral(s0, cat, wb(wss(cv(s0), c0), wss(cv(s0), c1))), wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, c0)), wa(wral(s0, cat, wi(wss(cv(s0), c0), wss(cv(s0), c1))), wral(s0, cat, wi(wss(cv(s0), c1), wss(cv(s0), c0)))))
  anbi12i(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, c0), wral(s0, cat, wi(wss(cv(s0), c0), wss(cv(s0), c1))), wral(s0, cat, wi(wss(cv(s0), c1), wss(cv(s0), c0))))
  chrelat3i(s0, c0, c1)
  chrelat3i(s0, c1, c0)
  eqss(c0, c1)
  ralbiim(s0, cat, wss(cv(s0), c0), wss(cv(s0), c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm chrelat4i(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 = c1 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ HAtoms,(s0 ⊆ c0 ↔ s0 ⊆ c1)))
  ⊣ c0 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c1 ∈ CH
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  3bitr4i(c0 = c1, ∀(s0 ∈ HAtoms,(s0 ⊆ c0 ↔ s0 ⊆ c1)), (c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ c1 ⊆ c0), (∀(s0 ∈ HAtoms,(s0 ⊆ c0 → s0 ⊆ c1))∧ ∀(s0 ∈ HAtoms,(s0 ⊆ c1 → s0 ⊆ c0))))
  anbi12i(c0 ⊆ c1, c1 ⊆ c0, ∀(s0 ∈ HAtoms,(s0 ⊆ c0 → s0 ⊆ c1)), ∀(s0 ∈ HAtoms,(s0 ⊆ c1 → s0 ⊆ c0)))
  chrelat3i(s0, c0, c1)

}

  breq1d(cin(c0, c1), ccv, c1, cin(cif(c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch)), c1), wceq(c0, cif(c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch))))
  ineq1(c0, cif(c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch)), c1)
  breq12d(c0, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1), cif(c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch)), co(cif(c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch)), chj, c1), wceq(c0, cif(c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch))))

  breq12d(cin(cif(c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch)), c1), ccv, c1, cin(cif(c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch)), cif(c1, chba, wcel(c1, cch))), cif(c1, chba, wcel(c1, cch)), wceq(c1, cif(c1, chba, wcel(c1, cch))))
  ineq2(c1, cif(c1, chba, wcel(c1, cch)), cif(c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch)))

blocks.name: cvp
blocks.content: The Hilbert lattice satisfies the covering property of Definition 7.4 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 31 and its converse. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: atnssm0
blocks.content: The meet of a Hilbert lattice element and an incomparable atom is the zero subspace. (Contributed by NM, 30-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: atnemeq0
blocks.content: The meet of distinct atoms is the zero subspace. (Contributed by NM, 25-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: atssma
blocks.content: The meet with an atom's superset is the atom. (Contributed by NM, 12-Jun-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.pretty:
thm atcv0eq(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms)→(0H[<oH](c0[vH]c1)↔ c0 = c1))
} = {
  impbid((c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms), 0H[<oH](c0[vH]c1), c0 = c1)

  3bitrd((c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms), c0 ≠ c1, (0H[<oH]c0 ∧ c0[<oH](c0[vH]c1)), (c0 ⋂ c1)= 0H, c0[<oH](c0[vH]c1))
  atnemeq0(c0, c1)

  cvp(c0, c1)

  atcv0(c0)
  syl2an(c0 ∈ HAtoms, c1 ∈ HAtoms, ((0H[<oH]c0 ∧ c0[<oH](c0[vH]c1))→ ¬ 0H[<oH](c0[vH]c1)), c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH)
  atelch(c0)
  syldan(c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH, ((0H[<oH]c0 ∧ c0[<oH](c0[vH]c1))→ ¬ 0H[<oH](c0[vH]c1)), (c0[vH]c1)∈ CH)
  chjcl(c0, c1)
  mp3an1(c0 ∈ CH, (c0[vH]c1)∈ CH, ((0H[<oH]c0 ∧ c0[<oH](c0[vH]c1))→ ¬ 0H[<oH](c0[vH]c1)), 0H ∈ CH)
  h0elch()
  cvntr(c0h, c0, (c0[vH]c1))
  adantl(c0 ∈ HAtoms, c1 ∈ HAtoms, (c0 = c1 → 0H[<oH](c0[vH]c1)))
  syl6com(c1 ∈ HAtoms, c0 = c1, 0H[<oH](c0[vH]c1), (c0[vH]c1)∈ HAtoms)
  ibd(c0 = c1, c1 ∈ HAtoms, (c0[vH]c1)∈ HAtoms)
  ex(c0 = c1, c1 ∈ HAtoms, (c1 ∈ HAtoms ↔(c0[vH]c1)∈ HAtoms))
  eleq1d(c1, cat, (c0[vH]c1), (c0 = c1 ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms))
  eqcomd(c1, (c0[vH]c1), (c0 = c1 ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms))
  sylan9eq((c0[vH]c1), c1, (c1[vH]c1), c0 = c1, c1 ∈ HAtoms)
  oveq1(c0, c1, chj, c1)
  syl(c1 ∈ HAtoms, (c1[vH]c1)= c1, c1 ∈ CH)
  atelch(c1)
  chjidm(c1)
  atcv0((c0[vH]c1))
}

blocks.name: atcv1
blocks.content: Two atoms covering the zero subspace are equal. (Contributed by NM, 26-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm atcv1(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat), wcel(c2, cat)), wbr(c0, ccv, co(c1, chj, c2))), wb(wceq(c0, c0h), wceq(c1, c2)))
} = {
  impbid(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat), wcel(c2, cat)), wbr(c0, ccv, co(c1, chj, c2))), wceq(c0, c0h), wceq(c1, c2))
  imp(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat), wcel(c2, cat)), wbr(c0, ccv, co(c1, chj, c2)), wi(wceq(c0, c0h), wceq(c1, c2)))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat), wcel(c2, cat), wi(wbr(c0, ccv, co(c1, chj, c2)), wi(wceq(c0, c0h), wceq(c1, c2))))
  com23(wa(wcel(c1, cat), wcel(c2, cat)), wbr(c0, ccv, co(c1, chj, c2)), wceq(c0, c0h), wceq(c1, c2))
  ex(wa(wcel(c1, cat), wcel(c2, cat)), wceq(c0, c0h), wi(wbr(c0, ccv, co(c1, chj, c2)), wceq(c1, c2)))
  biimpd(wa(wa(wcel(c1, cat), wcel(c2, cat)), wceq(c0, c0h)), wbr(c0, ccv, co(c1, chj, c2)), wceq(c1, c2))
  sylan9bbr(wa(wcel(c1, cat), wcel(c2, cat)), wceq(c0, c0h), wbr(c0, ccv, co(c1, chj, c2)), wceq(c1, c2), wbr(c0h, ccv, co(c1, chj, c2)))
  breq1(c0, c0h, ccv, co(c1, chj, c2))
  atcv0eq(c1, c2)
  imp(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat), wcel(c2, cat)), wbr(c0, ccv, co(c1, chj, c2)), wi(wceq(c1, c2), wceq(c0, c0h)))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat), wcel(c2, cat), wi(wbr(c0, ccv, co(c1, chj, c2)), wi(wceq(c1, c2), wceq(c0, c0h))))
  imp(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c2, cat), wi(wbr(c0, ccv, co(c1, chj, c2)), wi(wceq(c1, c2), wceq(c0, c0h))))
  com34(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c2, cat), wbr(c0, ccv, co(c1, chj, c2)), wceq(c1, c2), wceq(c0, c0h))
  exp32(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c2, cat), wceq(c1, c2), wi(wbr(c0, ccv, co(c1, chj, c2)), wceq(c0, c0h)))
  biimpd(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wa(wcel(c2, cat), wceq(c1, c2))), wbr(c0, ccv, co(c1, chj, c2)), wceq(c0, c0h))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cch), wa(wcel(c2, cat), wceq(c1, c2)), wb(wbr(c0, ccv, co(c1, chj, c2)), wceq(c0, c0h)), wcel(co(c1, chj, c2), cat))
  impcom(wcel(c2, cat), wceq(c1, c2), wcel(co(c1, chj, c2), cat))
  ibd(wceq(c1, c2), wcel(c2, cat), wcel(co(c1, chj, c2), cat))
  ex(wceq(c1, c2), wcel(c2, cat), wb(wcel(c2, cat), wcel(co(c1, chj, c2), cat)))
  eleq1d(c2, cat, co(c1, chj, c2), wa(wceq(c1, c2), wcel(c2, cat)))
  eqcomd(c2, co(c1, chj, c2), wa(wceq(c1, c2), wcel(c2, cat)))
  sylan9eq(co(c1, chj, c2), c2, co(c2, chj, c2), wceq(c1, c2), wcel(c2, cat))
  oveq1(c1, c2, chj, c2)
  syl(wcel(c2, cat), wceq(co(c2, chj, c2), c2), wcel(c2, cch))
  atelch(c2)
  chjidm(c2)
  atcveq0(c0, co(c1, chj, c2))
}

thm atcv1(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c2 ∈ HAtoms)∧ c0[<oH](c1[vH]c2))→(c0 = 0H ↔ c1 = c2))
} = {
  impbid(((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c2 ∈ HAtoms)∧ c0[<oH](c1[vH]c2)), c0 = 0H, c1 = c2)
  imp((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c2 ∈ HAtoms), c0[<oH](c1[vH]c2), (c0 = 0H → c1 = c2))
  3adant1(c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ HAtoms, c2 ∈ HAtoms, (c0[<oH](c1[vH]c2)→(c0 = 0H → c1 = c2)))
  com23((c1 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c2 ∈ HAtoms), c0[<oH](c1[vH]c2), c0 = 0H, c1 = c2)
  ex((c1 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c2 ∈ HAtoms), c0 = 0H, (c0[<oH](c1[vH]c2)→ c1 = c2))
  biimpd(((c1 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c2 ∈ HAtoms)∧ c0 = 0H), c0[<oH](c1[vH]c2), c1 = c2)
  sylan9bbr((c1 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c2 ∈ HAtoms), c0 = 0H, c0[<oH](c1[vH]c2), c1 = c2, 0H[<oH](c1[vH]c2))
  breq1(c0, c0h, ccv, (c1[vH]c2))
  atcv0eq(c1, c2)
  imp((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c2 ∈ HAtoms), c0[<oH](c1[vH]c2), (c1 = c2 → c0 = 0H))
  3adant2(c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ HAtoms, c2 ∈ HAtoms, (c0[<oH](c1[vH]c2)→(c1 = c2 → c0 = 0H)))
  imp(c0 ∈ CH, c2 ∈ HAtoms, (c0[<oH](c1[vH]c2)→(c1 = c2 → c0 = 0H)))
  com34(c0 ∈ CH, c2 ∈ HAtoms, c0[<oH](c1[vH]c2), c1 = c2, c0 = 0H)
  exp32(c0 ∈ CH, c2 ∈ HAtoms, c1 = c2, (c0[<oH](c1[vH]c2)→ c0 = 0H))
  biimpd((c0 ∈ CH ∧(c2 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c1 = c2)), c0[<oH](c1[vH]c2), c0 = 0H)
  sylan2(c0 ∈ CH, (c2 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c1 = c2), (c0[<oH](c1[vH]c2)↔ c0 = 0H), (c1[vH]c2)∈ HAtoms)
  impcom(c2 ∈ HAtoms, c1 = c2, (c1[vH]c2)∈ HAtoms)
  ibd(c1 = c2, c2 ∈ HAtoms, (c1[vH]c2)∈ HAtoms)
  ex(c1 = c2, c2 ∈ HAtoms, (c2 ∈ HAtoms ↔(c1[vH]c2)∈ HAtoms))
  eleq1d(c2, cat, (c1[vH]c2), (c1 = c2 ∧ c2 ∈ HAtoms))
  eqcomd(c2, (c1[vH]c2), (c1 = c2 ∧ c2 ∈ HAtoms))
  sylan9eq((c1[vH]c2), c2, (c2[vH]c2), c1 = c2, c2 ∈ HAtoms)
  oveq1(c1, c2, chj, c2)
  syl(c2 ∈ HAtoms, (c2[vH]c2)= c2, c2 ∈ CH)
  atelch(c2)
  chjidm(c2)
  atcveq0(c0, (c1[vH]c2))
}

blocks.name: atexch
blocks.content: The Hilbert lattice satisfies the atom exchange property. Proposition 1(i) of [Kalmbach] p. 140. A version of this theorem related to vector analysis was originally proved by Hermann Grassmann in 1862. Also Definition 3.4-3(b) in [MegPav2000] p. 2345 (PDF p. 8) (use ~ atnemeq0 to obtain atom inequality). (Contributed by NM, 27-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm atexch(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat), wcel(c2, cat)), wi(wa(wss(c1, co(c0, chj, c2)), wceq(cin(c0, c1), c0h)), wss(c2, co(c0, chj, c1))))
} = {
  ex(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat), wcel(c2, cat)), wa(wss(c1, co(c0, chj, c2)), wceq(cin(c0, c1), c0h)), wss(c2, co(c0, chj, c1)))
  sseqtr4d(c2, co(c0, chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c2), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat), wcel(c2, cat)), wa(wss(c1, co(c0, chj, c2)), wceq(cin(c0, c1), c0h))))

  sylan2(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c2, cat), wss(c2, co(c0, chj, c2)), wcel(c2, cch))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c2, cch), wss(c2, co(c0, chj, c2)))
  chub2(c2, c0)
  mpd(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat), wcel(c2, cat)), wa(wss(c1, co(c0, chj, c2)), wceq(cin(c0, c1), c0h))), wceq(co(c0, chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c2)), wa(wpss(c0, co(c0, chj, c1)), wss(co(c0, chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c2))))
  imp(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat), wcel(c2, cat)), wa(wss(c1, co(c0, chj, c2)), wceq(cin(c0, c1), c0h)), wa(wpss(c0, co(c0, chj, c1)), wss(co(c0, chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c2))))
  jcad(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat), wcel(c2, cat)), wa(wss(c1, co(c0, chj, c2)), wceq(cin(c0, c1), c0h)), wpss(c0, co(c0, chj, c1)), wss(co(c0, chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c2)))
  adantld(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat), wcel(c2, cat)), wss(c1, co(c0, chj, c2)), wceq(cin(c0, c1), c0h), wpss(c0, co(c0, chj, c1)))
  adantrd(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat), wcel(c2, cat)), wss(c1, co(c0, chj, c2)), wceq(cin(c0, c1), c0h), wss(co(c0, chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c2)))
  imp(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat), wcel(c2, cat)), wa(wss(c1, co(c0, chj, c2)), wceq(cin(c0, c1), c0h)), wi(wa(wpss(c0, co(c0, chj, c1)), wss(co(c0, chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c2))), wceq(co(c0, chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c2))))
  sylsyld(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat), wcel(c2, cat)), wa(wss(c1, co(c0, chj, c2)), wceq(cin(c0, c1), c0h)), wi(wa(wpss(c0, co(c0, chj, c1)), wss(co(c0, chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c2))), wceq(co(c0, chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c2))), w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(co(c0, chj, c2), cch), wcel(co(c0, chj, c1), cch)), wbr(c0, ccv, co(c0, chj, c2)))
  syl3an(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat), wcel(c2, cat), w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(co(c0, chj, c2), cch), wcel(co(c0, chj, c1), cch)), wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch))
  3jca(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch)), wcel(c0, cch), wcel(co(c0, chj, c2), cch), wcel(co(c0, chj, c1), cch))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch), wcel(co(c0, chj, c1), cch))
  sylibd(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat), wcel(c2, cat)), wa(wss(c1, co(c0, chj, c2)), wceq(cin(c0, c1), c0h)), wbr(c0, ccv, co(c0, chj, c2)), wpss(c0, co(c0, chj, c2)))
  syl6(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat), wcel(c2, cat)), wa(wss(c1, co(c0, chj, c2)), wceq(cin(c0, c1), c0h)), wpss(c0, co(c0, chj, c2)), wa(wpss(c0, co(c0, chj, c1)), wss(co(c0, chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c2))))
  ancomsd(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat), wcel(c2, cat)), wss(c1, co(c0, chj, c2)), wceq(cin(c0, c1), c0h), wa(wpss(c0, co(c0, chj, c1)), wss(co(c0, chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c2))))
  anim12d(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat), wcel(c2, cat)), wceq(cin(c0, c1), c0h), wss(c1, co(c0, chj, c2)), wpss(c0, co(c0, chj, c1)), wss(co(c0, chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c2)))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat), wcel(c2, cat), wi(wceq(cin(c0, c1), c0h), wpss(c0, co(c0, chj, c1))))
  sylbid(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat)), wceq(cin(c0, c1), c0h), wpss(c0, co(c0, chj, c1)), wbr(c0, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1)))
  cvp(c0, c1)

  sylan2(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat), wcel(co(c0, chj, c1), cch), wcel(c1, cch))
  chjcl(c0, c1)
  cvpss(c0, co(c0, chj, c1))
  syl3an(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat), wcel(c2, cat), wi(wss(c1, co(c0, chj, c2)), wss(co(c0, chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c2))), wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch))
  id(wcel(c0, cch))
  atelch(c1)
  atelch(c2)
  sylibd(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch)), wss(c1, co(c0, chj, c2)), wss(co(c0, chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c2)), wa(wss(c0, co(c0, chj, c2)), wss(c1, co(c0, chj, c2))))
  ancrd(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch)), wss(c1, co(c0, chj, c2)), wss(c0, co(c0, chj, c2)))
  a1d(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch)), wss(c1, co(c0, chj, c2)), wss(c0, co(c0, chj, c2)))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch), wss(c0, co(c0, chj, c2)))
  chub1(c0, c2)
  syld3an3(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch), wb(wa(wss(c0, co(c0, chj, c2)), wss(c1, co(c0, chj, c2))), wss(co(c0, chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c2))), wcel(co(c0, chj, c2), cch))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch), wcel(co(c0, chj, c2), cch))
  chjcl(c0, c2)
  chlub(c0, c1, co(c0, chj, c2))
  psssstr(c0, co(c0, chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c2))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat), wcel(c2, cat), wb(wpss(c0, co(c0, chj, c2)), wbr(c0, ccv, co(c0, chj, c2))))
  chcv2(c0, c2)
  cvnbtwn2(c0, co(c0, chj, c2), co(c0, chj, c1))

blocks.pretty:
thm atexch(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c2 ∈ HAtoms)→((c1 ⊆(c0[vH]c2)∧(c0 ⋂ c1)= 0H)→ c2 ⊆(c0[vH]c1)))
} = {
  ex((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c2 ∈ HAtoms), (c1 ⊆(c0[vH]c2)∧(c0 ⋂ c1)= 0H), c2 ⊆(c0[vH]c1))
  sseqtr4d(c2, (c0[vH]c1), (c0[vH]c2), ((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c2 ∈ HAtoms)∧(c1 ⊆(c0[vH]c2)∧(c0 ⋂ c1)= 0H)))
  adantr((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c2 ∈ HAtoms), (c1 ⊆(c0[vH]c2)∧(c0 ⋂ c1)= 0H), c2 ⊆(c0[vH]c2))
  3adant2(c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ HAtoms, c2 ∈ HAtoms, c2 ⊆(c0[vH]c2))
  sylan2(c0 ∈ CH, c2 ∈ HAtoms, c2 ⊆(c0[vH]c2), c2 ∈ CH)
  ancoms(c0 ∈ CH, c2 ∈ CH, c2 ⊆(c0[vH]c2))
  chub2(c2, c0)
  mpd(((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c2 ∈ HAtoms)∧(c1 ⊆(c0[vH]c2)∧(c0 ⋂ c1)= 0H)), (c0[vH]c1)=(c0[vH]c2), (c0 ⊊(c0[vH]c1)∧(c0[vH]c1)⊆(c0[vH]c2)))
  imp((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c2 ∈ HAtoms), (c1 ⊆(c0[vH]c2)∧(c0 ⋂ c1)= 0H), (c0 ⊊(c0[vH]c1)∧(c0[vH]c1)⊆(c0[vH]c2)))
  jcad((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c2 ∈ HAtoms), (c1 ⊆(c0[vH]c2)∧(c0 ⋂ c1)= 0H), c0 ⊊(c0[vH]c1), (c0[vH]c1)⊆(c0[vH]c2))
  adantld((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c2 ∈ HAtoms), c1 ⊆(c0[vH]c2), (c0 ⋂ c1)= 0H, c0 ⊊(c0[vH]c1))
  adantrd((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c2 ∈ HAtoms), c1 ⊆(c0[vH]c2), (c0 ⋂ c1)= 0H, (c0[vH]c1)⊆(c0[vH]c2))

blocks.name: atomli
blocks.content: An assertion holding in atomic orthomodular lattices that is equivalent to the exchange axiom. Proposition 3.2.17 of [PtakPulmannova] p. 66. (Contributed by NM, 24-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: atcvati
blocks.content: A nonzero Hilbert lattice element less than the join of two atoms is an atom. (Contributed by NM, 28-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)

} = {
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cat)), wa(wne(c2, c0h), wpss(c2, co(c0, chj, c1))), wcel(c2, cat))

  atcvatlem(c0, c1, c2)
  imp(wa(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cat)), wa(wne(c2, c0h), wpss(c2, co(c0, chj, c1))), wi(wn(wss(c1, c2)), wcel(c2, cat)))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cat), wi(wa(wne(c2, c0h), wpss(c2, co(c0, chj, c1))), wi(wn(wss(c1, c2)), wcel(c2, cat))))
  sylbird(wa(wcel(c1, cat), wcel(c0, cat)), wa(wne(c2, c0h), wpss(c2, co(c0, chj, c1))), wi(wn(wss(c1, c2)), wcel(c2, cat)), wa(wne(c2, c0h), wpss(c2, co(c1, chj, c0))))
  anbi2d(wa(wcel(c1, cat), wcel(c0, cat)), wne(c2, c0h), wpss(c2, co(c1, chj, c0)), wpss(c2, co(c0, chj, c1)))
  psseq2d(c2, co(c1, chj, c0), co(c0, chj, c1), wa(wcel(c1, cat), wcel(c0, cat)))
  syl2an(wcel(c1, cat), wcel(c0, cat), wceq(co(c1, chj, c0), co(c0, chj, c1)), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c0, cch))
  chjcom(c1, c0)
  ex(wa(wcel(c1, cat), wcel(c0, cat)), wa(wne(c2, c0h), wpss(c2, co(c1, chj, c0))), wi(wn(wss(c1, c2)), wcel(c2, cat)))
  atcvatlem(c1, c0, c2)
  adantrl(wa(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cat)), wne(c2, c0h), wpss(c2, co(c0, chj, c1)), wo(wn(wss(c0, c2)), wn(wss(c1, c2))))
  imp(wa(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cat)), wpss(c2, co(c0, chj, c1)), wo(wn(wss(c0, c2)), wn(wss(c1, c2))))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cat), wi(wpss(c2, co(c0, chj, c1)), wo(wn(wss(c0, c2)), wn(wss(c1, c2)))), wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch))
  atelch(c0)
  atelch(c1)
  mp3an1(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wi(wpss(c2, co(c0, chj, c1)), wo(wn(wss(c0, c2)), wn(wss(c1, c2)))), wcel(c2, cch))
  syl6ib(w3a(wcel(c2, cch), wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wpss(c2, co(c0, chj, c1)), wo(wn(wss(c0, c2)), wn(wss(c1, c2))), wn(wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c1, c2))))
  con2d(w3a(wcel(c2, cch), wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wpss(c2, co(c0, chj, c1)), wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c1, c2)))
  syl6bi(w3a(wcel(c2, cch), wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c1, c2)), wn(wpss(c2, co(c0, chj, c1))), wss(co(c0, chj, c1), c2))
  3comr(wcel(c2, cch), wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wb(wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c1, c2)), wss(co(c0, chj, c1), c2)))
  chlub(c0, c1, c2)
  ssnpss(co(c0, chj, c1), c2)
  ianor(wss(c0, c2), wss(c1, c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm atcvati(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms)→((c2 ≠ 0H ∧ c2 ⊊(c0[vH]c1))→ c2 ∈ HAtoms))
  ⊣ c2 ∈ CH
} = {
  ex((c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms), (c2 ≠ 0H ∧ c2 ⊊(c0[vH]c1)), c2 ∈ HAtoms)
  mpjaod(((c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms)∧(c2 ≠ 0H ∧ c2 ⊊(c0[vH]c1))), c2 ∈ HAtoms, ¬ c0 ⊆ c2, ¬ c1 ⊆ c2)
  atcvatlem(c0, c1, c2)
  imp((c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms), (c2 ≠ 0H ∧ c2 ⊊(c0[vH]c1)), (¬ c1 ⊆ c2 → c2 ∈ HAtoms))
  ancoms(c0 ∈ HAtoms, c1 ∈ HAtoms, ((c2 ≠ 0H ∧ c2 ⊊(c0[vH]c1))→(¬ c1 ⊆ c2 → c2 ∈ HAtoms)))
  sylbird((c1 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c0 ∈ HAtoms), (c2 ≠ 0H ∧ c2 ⊊(c0[vH]c1)), (¬ c1 ⊆ c2 → c2 ∈ HAtoms), (c2 ≠ 0H ∧ c2 ⊊(c1[vH]c0)))
  anbi2d((c1 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c0 ∈ HAtoms), c2 ≠ 0H, c2 ⊊(c1[vH]c0), c2 ⊊(c0[vH]c1))
  psseq2d(c2, (c1[vH]c0), (c0[vH]c1), (c1 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c0 ∈ HAtoms))
  syl2an(c1 ∈ HAtoms, c0 ∈ HAtoms, (c1[vH]c0)=(c0[vH]c1), c1 ∈ CH, c0 ∈ CH)
  chjcom(c1, c0)
  ex((c1 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c0 ∈ HAtoms), (c2 ≠ 0H ∧ c2 ⊊(c1[vH]c0)), (¬ c1 ⊆ c2 → c2 ∈ HAtoms))
  atcvatlem(c1, c0, c2)
  adantrl((c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms), c2 ≠ 0H, c2 ⊊(c0[vH]c1), (¬ c0 ⊆ c2 ∨ ¬ c1 ⊆ c2))
  imp((c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms), c2 ⊊(c0[vH]c1), (¬ c0 ⊆ c2 ∨ ¬ c1 ⊆ c2))
  syl2an(c0 ∈ HAtoms, c1 ∈ HAtoms, (c2 ⊊(c0[vH]c1)→(¬ c0 ⊆ c2 ∨ ¬ c1 ⊆ c2)), c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH)
  atelch(c0)
  atelch(c1)
  mp3an1(c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH, (c2 ⊊(c0[vH]c1)→(¬ c0 ⊆ c2 ∨ ¬ c1 ⊆ c2)), c2 ∈ CH)
  syl6ib((c2 ∈ CH ∧ c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH), c2 ⊊(c0[vH]c1), (¬ c0 ⊆ c2 ∨ ¬ c1 ⊆ c2), ¬(c0 ⊆ c2 ∧ c1 ⊆ c2))
  con2d((c2 ∈ CH ∧ c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH), c2 ⊊(c0[vH]c1), (c0 ⊆ c2 ∧ c1 ⊆ c2))
  syl6bi((c2 ∈ CH ∧ c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH), (c0 ⊆ c2 ∧ c1 ⊆ c2), ¬ c2 ⊊(c0[vH]c1), (c0[vH]c1)⊆ c2)
  3comr(c2 ∈ CH, c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH, ((c0 ⊆ c2 ∧ c1 ⊆ c2)↔(c0[vH]c1)⊆ c2))
  chlub(c0, c1, c2)
  ssnpss((c0[vH]c1), c2)
  ianor(c0 ⊆ c2, c1 ⊆ c2)
}

blocks.name: atcvat2i
blocks.content: A Hilbert lattice element covered by the join of two distinct atoms is an atom. (Contributed by NM, 26-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm atcvat2i(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cat)), wi(wa(wn(wceq(c0, c1)), wbr(c2, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1))), wcel(c2, cat)))
  -| wcel(c2, cch)
} = {
  impd(wa(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cat)), wn(wceq(c0, c1)), wbr(c2, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1)), wcel(c2, cat))
  com23(wa(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cat)), wn(wceq(c0, c1)), wbr(c2, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1)), wcel(c2, cat))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cat)), wbr(c2, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1)), wi(wn(wceq(c0, c1)), wcel(c2, cat)))
  sylbird(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cat)), wbr(c2, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1))), wn(wceq(c0, c1)), wcel(c2, cat), wne(c2, c0h))
  necon3abid(c2, c0h, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cat)), wbr(c2, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1))), wceq(c0, c1))
  mp3anl1(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cat), wbr(c2, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1)), wb(wceq(c2, c0h), wceq(c0, c1)), wcel(c2, cch))
  atcv1(c2, c0, c1)
  imp(wa(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cat)), wbr(c2, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1)), wi(wne(c2, c0h), wcel(c2, cat)))
  syld(wa(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cat)), wbr(c2, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1)), wi(wne(c2, c0h), wcel(c2, cat)), wpss(c2, co(c0, chj, c1)))
  sylancr(wa(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cat)), wi(wbr(c2, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1)), wpss(c2, co(c0, chj, c1))), wcel(c2, cch), wcel(co(c0, chj, c1), cch))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cat), wcel(co(c0, chj, c1), cch), wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch))
  atelch(c0)
  atelch(c1)
  chjcl(c0, c1)
  cvpss(c2, co(c0, chj, c1))
  expcomd(wa(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cat)), wpss(c2, co(c0, chj, c1)), wne(c2, c0h), wcel(c2, cat))
  atcvati(c0, c1, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm atcvat2i(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms)→((¬ c0 = c1 ∧ c2[<oH](c0[vH]c1))→ c2 ∈ HAtoms))
  ⊣ c2 ∈ CH
} = {
  impd((c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms), ¬ c0 = c1, c2[<oH](c0[vH]c1), c2 ∈ HAtoms)
  com23((c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms), ¬ c0 = c1, c2[<oH](c0[vH]c1), c2 ∈ HAtoms)
  ex((c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms), c2[<oH](c0[vH]c1), (¬ c0 = c1 → c2 ∈ HAtoms))
  sylbird(((c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms)∧ c2[<oH](c0[vH]c1)), ¬ c0 = c1, c2 ∈ HAtoms, c2 ≠ 0H)
  necon3abid(c2, c0h, ((c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms)∧ c2[<oH](c0[vH]c1)), c0 = c1)
  mp3anl1(c0 ∈ HAtoms, c1 ∈ HAtoms, c2[<oH](c0[vH]c1), (c2 = 0H ↔ c0 = c1), c2 ∈ CH)
  atcv1(c2, c0, c1)
  imp((c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms), c2[<oH](c0[vH]c1), (c2 ≠ 0H → c2 ∈ HAtoms))
  syld((c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms), c2[<oH](c0[vH]c1), (c2 ≠ 0H → c2 ∈ HAtoms), c2 ⊊(c0[vH]c1))
  sylancr((c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms), (c2[<oH](c0[vH]c1)→ c2 ⊊(c0[vH]c1)), c2 ∈ CH, (c0[vH]c1)∈ CH)
  syl2an(c0 ∈ HAtoms, c1 ∈ HAtoms, (c0[vH]c1)∈ CH, c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH)
  atelch(c0)
  atelch(c1)
  chjcl(c0, c1)
  cvpss(c2, (c0[vH]c1))
  expcomd((c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms), c2 ⊊(c0[vH]c1), c2 ≠ 0H, c2 ∈ HAtoms)
  atcvati(c0, c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: atord
blocks.content: An ordering law for a Hilbert lattice atom and a commuting subspace. (Contributed by NM, 12-Jun-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm atord(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat), wbr(c0, ccm, c1)), wo(wss(c1, c0), wss(c1, cfv(cort, c0))))
} = {
  3impib(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat), wbr(c0, ccm, c1), wo(wss(c1, c0), wss(c1, cfv(cort, c0))))
  dedth(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch), wi(wa(wcel(c1, cat), wbr(c0, ccm, c1)), wo(wss(c1, c0), wss(c1, cfv(cort, c0)))), wi(wa(wcel(c1, cat), wbr(cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch)), ccm, c1)), wo(wss(c1, cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch))), wss(c1, cfv(cort, cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch)))))))
  imbi12d(wceq(c0, cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch))), wa(wcel(c1, cat), wbr(c0, ccm, c1)), wo(wss(c1, c0), wss(c1, cfv(cort, c0))), wa(wcel(c1, cat), wbr(cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch)), ccm, c1)), wo(wss(c1, cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch))), wss(c1, cfv(cort, cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch))))))
  anbi2d(wceq(c0, cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch))), wcel(c1, cat), wbr(c0, ccm, c1), wbr(cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch)), ccm, c1))
  breq1(c0, cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch)), ccm, c1)
  orbi12d(wceq(c0, cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch))), wss(c1, c0), wss(c1, cfv(cort, c0)), wss(c1, cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch))), wss(c1, cfv(cort, cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch)))))
  sseq2(c0, cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch)), c1)
  sseq2d(c1, cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch))), wceq(c0, cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch))))
  fveq2(c0, cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch)), cort)
  atordi(c1, cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch)))
  elimel(c0, cch, c0h)
  h0elch()
}
blocks.pretty:
thm atord(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c0[C_H]c1)→(c1 ⊆ c0 ∨ c1 ⊆(_|_ ` c0)))
} = {
  3impib(c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ HAtoms, c0[C_H]c1, (c1 ⊆ c0 ∨ c1 ⊆(_|_ ` c0)))
  dedth(c0, c0h, c0 ∈ CH, ((c1 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c0[C_H]c1)→(c1 ⊆ c0 ∨ c1 ⊆(_|_ ` c0))), ((c1 ∈ HAtoms ∧ if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H)[C_H]c1)→(c1 ⊆ if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H)∨ c1 ⊆(_|_ ` if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H)))))
  imbi12d(c0 = if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H), (c1 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c0[C_H]c1), (c1 ⊆ c0 ∨ c1 ⊆(_|_ ` c0)), (c1 ∈ HAtoms ∧ if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H)[C_H]c1), (c1 ⊆ if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H)∨ c1 ⊆(_|_ ` if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H))))
  anbi2d(c0 = if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H), c1 ∈ HAtoms, c0[C_H]c1, if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H)[C_H]c1)
  breq1(c0, if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H), ccm, c1)
  orbi12d(c0 = if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H), c1 ⊆ c0, c1 ⊆(_|_ ` c0), c1 ⊆ if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H), c1 ⊆(_|_ ` if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H)))
  sseq2(c0, if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H), c1)
  sseq2d(c1, (_|_ ` c0), (_|_ ` if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H)), c0 = if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H))
  fveq2(c0, if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H), cort)
  atordi(c1, if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H))
  elimel(c0, cch, c0h)
  h0elch()
}

blocks.name: atcvat2
blocks.content: A Hilbert lattice element covered by the join of two distinct atoms is an atom. (Contributed by NM, 29-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm atcvat2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat), wcel(c2, cat)), wi(wa(wn(wceq(c1, c2)), wbr(c0, ccv, co(c1, chj, c2))), wcel(c0, cat)))
} = {
  3impib(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat), wcel(c2, cat), wi(wa(wn(wceq(c1, c2)), wbr(c0, ccv, co(c1, chj, c2))), wcel(c0, cat)))
  dedth(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch), wi(wa(wcel(c1, cat), wcel(c2, cat)), wi(wa(wn(wceq(c1, c2)), wbr(c0, ccv, co(c1, chj, c2))), wcel(c0, cat))), wi(wa(wcel(c1, cat), wcel(c2, cat)), wi(wa(wn(wceq(c1, c2)), wbr(cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch)), ccv, co(c1, chj, c2))), wcel(cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch)), cat))))
  imbi2d(wceq(c0, cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch))), wa(wcel(c1, cat), wcel(c2, cat)), wi(wa(wn(wceq(c1, c2)), wbr(c0, ccv, co(c1, chj, c2))), wcel(c0, cat)), wi(wa(wn(wceq(c1, c2)), wbr(cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch)), ccv, co(c1, chj, c2))), wcel(cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch)), cat)))
  imbi12d(wceq(c0, cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch))), wa(wn(wceq(c1, c2)), wbr(c0, ccv, co(c1, chj, c2))), wcel(c0, cat), wa(wn(wceq(c1, c2)), wbr(cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch)), ccv, co(c1, chj, c2))), wcel(cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch)), cat))
  anbi2d(wceq(c0, cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch))), wn(wceq(c1, c2)), wbr(c0, ccv, co(c1, chj, c2)), wbr(cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch)), ccv, co(c1, chj, c2)))
  breq1(c0, cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch)), ccv, co(c1, chj, c2))
  eleq1(c0, cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch)), cat)
  atcvat2i(c1, c2, cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch)))
  elimel(c0, cch, c0h)
  h0elch()
}
blocks.pretty:
thm atcvat2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c2 ∈ HAtoms)→((¬ c1 = c2 ∧ c0[<oH](c1[vH]c2))→ c0 ∈ HAtoms))
} = {
  3impib(c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ HAtoms, c2 ∈ HAtoms, ((¬ c1 = c2 ∧ c0[<oH](c1[vH]c2))→ c0 ∈ HAtoms))
  dedth(c0, c0h, c0 ∈ CH, ((c1 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c2 ∈ HAtoms)→((¬ c1 = c2 ∧ c0[<oH](c1[vH]c2))→ c0 ∈ HAtoms)), ((c1 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c2 ∈ HAtoms)→((¬ c1 = c2 ∧ if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H)[<oH](c1[vH]c2))→ if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H)∈ HAtoms)))
  imbi2d(c0 = if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H), (c1 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c2 ∈ HAtoms), ((¬ c1 = c2 ∧ c0[<oH](c1[vH]c2))→ c0 ∈ HAtoms), ((¬ c1 = c2 ∧ if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H)[<oH](c1[vH]c2))→ if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H)∈ HAtoms))
  imbi12d(c0 = if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H), (¬ c1 = c2 ∧ c0[<oH](c1[vH]c2)), c0 ∈ HAtoms, (¬ c1 = c2 ∧ if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H)[<oH](c1[vH]c2)), if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H)∈ HAtoms)
  anbi2d(c0 = if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H), ¬ c1 = c2, c0[<oH](c1[vH]c2), if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H)[<oH](c1[vH]c2))
  breq1(c0, if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H), ccv, (c1[vH]c2))
  eleq1(c0, if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H), cat)
  atcvat2i(c1, c2, if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H))
  elimel(c0, cch, c0h)
  h0elch()
}
